tags.name: Discovery and Exposure Management
tags.description:
Discovery and Exposure Management(CDEM) APIs help you in identifying unmanaged or exposed assets that must be secured. You can use the APIs in this section to fetch the details that are displayed in the Discovery and Exposure Management(CDEM) dashboard. 
 For more information about Discovery and Exposure Management(CDEM) dashboard, see [Discovery and Exposure Management(CDEM) dashboard](https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/content-collections/dashboards/dashboards-discovery-exposure-management)

post.description: Onboard the cloud accounts to CSPM in order to secure the unmanaged assets identified by the CDEM dashboard.
Get the list of assets based on cloud-type, asset-type, manage-type, and service-type.
Get the list of findings of an asset by asset id. Findings are security issues, including vulnerabilities discovered on the asset.
Get the list of filters and their possible values based on which you can retrieve the findings of an asset.
You can temporarily or permanently snooze the notifications from your unmanaged (internet-exposed) assets.
Unsnooze list of snoozed unmanaged assets.
Sends email with details of assets.
Download list of unmanaged assets based on filters.

post.summary: Get Aggregated Asset Count by Asset Type
post.description: Get count of assets aggregated by asset type based on cloud provider,service type,asset-type, and manage-type.

post.summary: Get Aggregated Asset Count by Cloud Type
post.description: Get count of assets aggregated by cloud service provider.

get.description: Get details of a service by service id

parameters.name: all_service_detail
parameters.description: Boolean flag to fetch all service details

get.description: Get industry benchmark data which is used to identify the vulnerabilities and security risks.
Get the list of accounts that are not managed by CSPM but can be onboarded to CSPM.
Get the list of unmanaged assets that can be onboarded to CSPM.

parameters.name: convertible
parameters.description: Filter assets based on if they are convertible.

get.description: Get asset trend for managed, unmanaged, and remediated assets for last 90 days.
Get the list of top risks for assets.
Get the internet exposure risk statistics of every asset type for last 24 hours
Get the total number of convertible assets.
Get asset overview or details by asset id.

parameters.name: all_asset_details
parameters.description: Set it true to fetch all asset details.

get.summary: Get Vulnerabilities in an Asset by ID
get.description: Returns list of all the vulnerabilities in an asset by ID. You can use this endpoint to get the details that are displayed in the Top Risks from Unmanaged Assets widget.

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Asset type is the types of scanned assets.

parameters.name: manage_type
parameters.description: Asset management type indicates if the asset is managed by Prisma Cloud.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Next page is the token from the previous API call to fetch the remaining data.

get.summary: Get Flow Logs of Unmanaged Assets
get.description: Fetch traffic flow log between internet-exposed (unmanaged) and secure (managed) assets.

get.summary: Get List of Service for an Asset
get.description: Get the list of services for assets by asset-id.

get.summary: Get Impacted Distros for a Vulnerability
get.description: Get the list of all the distributions(distros) and its packages that are impacted by the vulnerability based on the CVE ID.
Retrieve the list of regex patterns used to snooze or unsnooze assets. You can snooze or unsnooze assets that match a regex pattern. These patterns can be fetched using this API.
Returns the list of supported asset filters and their values. You can use these filters and their values on other APIs to fetch the required assets.

items.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

accountMappingStatus.description: **Mapped** indicates that the asset is connected to a parent account or organizational unit (OU) on Prisma Cloud, whereas **unmapped** signifies that the asset is not associated with any parent account or OU on Prisma Cloud.

snoozeStatus.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

regex.description: Regular expression to filter the assets. The snooze setting will be applied to all the assets that match this regular expression.

temporarySnooze.description: True to snooze the notifications temporarily and false to snooze the notifications permanently. To snooze notifications temporarily, you must also specify the snoozeTimeRange.

regex.description: Regular expression to filter the assets. The snooze setting will be applied to all the assets that match this regular expression.

amount.description: A value for the time unit.

type.description: Value must be **relative** to indicate relative time range model.

snoozeStatus.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

items.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

accountMappingStatus.description: **Mapped** indicates that the asset is connected to a parent account or organizational unit (OU) on Prisma Cloud, whereas **unmapped** signifies that the asset is not associated with any parent account or OU on Prisma Cloud.

items.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

accountMappingStatus.description: **Mapped** indicates that the asset is connected to a parent account or organizational unit (OU) on Prisma Cloud, whereas **unmapped** signifies that the asset is not associated with any parent account or OU on Prisma Cloud.

value.description: List of assets grouped by geolocation

GeoLocation.description: List of assets grouped by geolocation

items.description: Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.

accountMappingStatus.description: **Mapped** indicates that the asset is connected to a parent account or organizational unit (OU) on Prisma Cloud, whereas **unmapped** signifies that the asset is not associated with any parent account or OU on Prisma Cloud.

x-redlock-auth.description: The x-redlock-auth value is a JSON Web Token (JWT).
x-redlock-auth.name: x-redlock-auth
